package.name: usv_comm
package.description: 该包为USV（无人船）系统提供通信相关节点与功能，包括状态信息的组装与发布、自动设置home点等，支持多模块间的数据交互。 This package provides communication-related nodes and functions for USV (Unmanned Surface Vehicle) systems, including status message assembly and publishing, auto home point setting, and supports data exchange between multiple modules.
